definition: to hold/to contain/to ladle/to pick up with a utensil

sentences.english: But Mr. Viniar declined to discuss in detail the impact that the new regulations would have on Goldman, saying that it was too early to give any guidance on the subject.
sentences.chinese: 关于新法案对高盛的影响，维尼亚拒绝详细置评。

sentences.english: Goldman is coining it again for two reasons.
Economists at Goldman Sachs reckon it should be closer to $500 billion.
sentences.chinese: 高盛投资公司评估说应该接近五千亿。

sentences.english: Mr. Blankfein prefers to emphasize the role of Goldman's self-help initiatives.
sentences.chinese: 布兰克费恩更希望强调高盛自救措施的作用。

sentences.english: Rubins bet earned Goldman many multiples of Blacks salary.
sentences.chinese: 鲁宾的豪赌为高盛带来的收入是布莱克薪水的好几倍。

sentences.english: One recent story profiled a twenty-seven-year-old trader from Goldman Sachs.
sentences.chinese: 最近有人提到了一个来自高盛集团的27岁的交易者。

sentences.english: Goldman=system, is a good summary of so many snide mutterings.
sentences.chinese: 高盛＝金融体系，这就是如此多冷言冷语的最佳概括。

sentences.english: Earnings from Goldman Sachs (GS 153.70, +3.01, +2.00%) are due on Tuesday.
sentences.chinese: 高盛集团将于周二公布财报收益。

sentences.english: For Goldman, the main risks may now be in the courts.
sentences.chinese: 对高盛来说，现在主要的危险可能在法院。

sentences.english: Mr. Trott had approached Mr. Buffett before with at least one offer to invest in Goldman.
sentences.chinese: 以前，特洛特曾至少一次向巴菲特提议过投资高盛。

sentences.english: it's more of like the investment banks, you know, the Morgan Stanley, and the Goldman Sachs.
sentences.chinese: 更可能想到投资银行，如摩根斯坦利，还有高盛。

sentences.english: Prime brokerage has been haemorrhaging clients to Goldman Sachs and others.
sentences.chinese: 机构经纪的大量客户已经流失到高盛等公司。

sentences.english: Goldman Sachs (GS) has attracted a large share of hungry minds that went on to garner 10-figure fortunes.
sentences.chinese: 高盛则吸引了很多野心勃勃想大赚10位数财富的人。

sentences.english: For the first time, it's poised to surpass both Goldman Sachs and Morgan Stanley in the lucrative M&A business.
sentences.chinese: 在兼并重组业务方面上它超过了高盛和摩根士丹利。

sentences.english: His forte at Goldman, above all, was deal-making.
sentences.chinese: 他在高盛的过人之处在于交易决策。

sentences.english: In America, Goldman still has legions of admirers.
sentences.chinese: 在美国，高盛公司仍然备受倾慕。

definition: the Stars and Stripes (US flag)/by extension, the United States of America/abbr. for Citibank 花旗銀行|花旗银行
Wall Street, New York/by extension, American big business
Bloomberg (name)/Michael Bloomberg (1942-), US billionaire businessman, politician and philanthropist
Standard and Poor (share index)/abbr. for 標準普爾|标准普尔[Biao1 zhun3 Pu3 er3]
Standard and Poor's (S&P), company specializing in financial market ratings/S&P financial index
Moody's, company specializing in financial market ratings
